manifest.title: Cal.com
manifest.author: Cal.com authors
manifest.description:
## Overview

Cal.com is a fully customizable scheduling software for individuals, businesses taking calls and developers building scheduling platforms where users meet users. Focus on meeting, not making meetings. Free for individuals.

## Features

* Connect your calendars - Cal reads your availability from all your existing calendars ensuring you never get double booked!
* Set your availability - Set repeating schedules for the times of the day and week that you want people to be able to book you.
* Share your link - Share your short cal.com personal link and make it incredibly easy for people to book a meeting at a time that works for both of you!
* Let people book when it works for both of you
manifest.changelog:
* Update cal.com to 6.1.14
* [Full Changelog](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/releases/tag/v6.1.14)
* fix: (booking-audit) Remove IS\_PRODUCTION gate and add feature flag check in producer by [@​hariombalhara](https://github.com/hariombalhara) in [#​26524](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/26524)
* fix: allow unmarking host as no-show by [@​hariombalhara](https://github.com/hariombalhara) in [#​27694](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/27694)
* feat: show routing trace dialog on assignment reason badge click by [@​joeauyeung](https://github.com/joeauyeung) in [#​27629](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/27629)
* feat: add routing trace seeding to seed-insights by [@​hariombalhara](https://github.com/hariombalhara) in [#​27782](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/27782)
* fix: hide cal branding on platform workflows by [@​supalarry](https://github.com/supalarry) in [#​27385](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/27385)
* refactor: Stop using Unkey for IP-based rate limiting by [@​keithwillcode](https://github.com/keithwillcode) in [#​27674](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/27674)
* perf: add composite index on (formId, createdAt) for App\_RoutingForms\_FormResponse by [@​keithwillcode](https://github.com/keithwillcode) in [#​27252](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/27252)
* chore: Use IF NOT EXISTS for index of App\_RoutingForms\_FormResponse by [@​keithwillcode](https://github.com/keithwillcode) in [#​27814](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/27814)
* fix: remove duplicate "Name" label on team creation page by [@​CarinaWolli](https://github.com/CarinaWolli) in [#​27803](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/27803)
* fix: add isCompanyEmail check to organization upgrade path by [@​sean-brydon](https://github.com/sean-brydon) in [#​27813](https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/27813)
